meanings.definition: Lemmatizes: to group together the inflected forms of a word so they can be analyzed as a single item
meanings.sent1: The software lemmatizes the words to simplify analysis.
meanings.sent2: She lemmatizes the data before conducting her research.
meanings.sent3: The robot lemmatizes the words like a diligent librarian organizing books.
meanings.sent4: His mind lemmatizes the information effortlessly, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Lemmatizes, like a magic wand, transforms complex words into manageable units.

meanings.definition: Lemmatizes: to determine the base or root form of a word
meanings.sent1: The tool lemmatizes the words to find their original forms.
meanings.sent2: He lemmatizes the words to understand their core meanings.
meanings.sent3: The detective lemmatizes the clues to uncover the truth.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition lemmatizes the situation, revealing the underlying truth.
meanings.sent5: Lemmatizes, like a detective, uncovers the hidden essence of words.
